  • Method Details

    • verifyLogin

      public boolean verifyLogin(String password)
      This method compares the password with the stored password to check if they are identical. Returns True if match false if not match
      Parameters:
      password - input string from user
      Returns:
      true if the password matches false if password doesnt match

    • resetStats

      public void resetStats()
      Resets all the statistics not sure why we are doing this but sure

    • revive

      public boolean revive(Pet pet)
      Returns true if successfully revived pet (as in it wasnt dead) returns false if the pet is already alive
      Parameters:
      pet - to revive.
      Returns:
      True is revive successful, False if revive not successful

    • setPlayTimeLimit

      public void setPlayTimeLimit(int limit)
      Sets the play time limit.
      Parameters:
      limit - The time limit to set, in minutes.

    • updatePlayTimeLimit

      public void updatePlayTimeLimit(int time)
      Updates the total play time by adding the specified time.
      Parameters:
      time - The amount of time to add to the total play time, in minutes.
